DataElement.preferredDefinition: Watching something and taking note of what happens.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active._A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data._Method of administration.
